text: Teater Galeasen is an independent Swedish theatre group based at Skeppsholmen in Stockholm. It was founded in 1983. Teater Galeasen is known for their singular, avant-garde and experimental productions of both classic and contemporary dramatic work. They work with freelance actors and directors. ==External links== * Teater Galeasen (official site - non-English) Galeasen Category:1983 establishments in Sweden
title: Teater Galeasen
